resources.string:
In this game, you will be shooting evil aliens that happen to see. 

A normal alien is a blue alien that you should not shoot. 

An evil alien is a red and yellow devil alien. 

The purpose of this game is to click as many evil aliens that you see as possible.

Each successful hit on a evil alien gets you one point while an accidental hit to a normal alien loses you 2 points.

You will have 30 seconds to shoot as many evil aliens as you can and score as high as possible.

 Good Luck!!
The game has finished and the result has been saved. Click "Return" to go to the main menu.

Welcome to AlienGuesser, in this game you will be presented various problems. Your goal is to make deduction based on the problem and guess the correct answer from a few possible answer. Each correct guess will award you two points, each incorrect guess will deduct one point. Good Luck! \n \n Click "Next" to begin guessing.
Congratulations, you have made the correct guess!
Unfortunate, you have made an incorrect guess.
